oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. Harry T. Burn letter, September 18, 1920.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Harry T. Burn, Bank of Niota, Niota, TN, to Mrs. Crozier French. September 18, 1920. Expresses thanks for the banquet ticket, he plans to come but his mother cannot attend. Lizzie Crozier French Papers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Banquets; Tickets; Correspondence;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Harry T. Burn
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
